clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Investigated for use treatment in solid tumors

incompatibilities.description: The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Peginesatide is combined with Vintafolide
The metabolism of Vintafolide can be decreased when combined with Posaconazole
The metabolism of Vintafolide can be decreased when combined with Voriconazole
The serum concentration of Vintafolide can be increased when it is combined with Lopinavir
